Class GameController

java.lang.Object
othello.gui.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Manages the interaction between model and view of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Starts the game, called after controller initialization in start method of App. Sets the 2 players, their colors, and creates an OthelloGame for logic handling. Then, shows the first move, beginning the game "loop".
      Parameters:
      arg1 - type of player for player 1, either "human" or some computer strategy
      arg2 - type of player for player 2, either "human" or some computer strategy

    • initGame

      public void initGame(String arg1, String arg2)

    • toggleTheme

      protected void toggleTheme()

    • displayBoard

      protected void displayBoard()
      Displays the board initially, adding the GUI squares into the window. Also adds the initial state of the board with black and white taking spaces at the center.

    • clearBoard

      protected void clearBoard()
      Clears the board visually, called every time the board is redisplayed after the first time

    • initSpaces

      protected void initSpaces()
      Sets the initial state of the Othello board

    • turnText

      protected void turnText(Player player)
      Displays the score of the board and the current turn.

    • skipTurnText

      protected void skipTurnText(Player player)
      Displays the score of the board.

    • takeTurn

      protected void takeTurn(Player player)
      Either shows moves for humans or makes a decision for a computer.
      Parameters:
      player - player to take a turn for, whether its human or computer

    • showMoves

      protected void showMoves(HumanPlayer player)
      Shows the current moves possible for the current board configuration. If availableMoves is null, the getAvailableMoves method is likely not implemented yet. If availableMoves is empty (no moves found, or full board), the game ends.
      Parameters:
      player - player to show moves for

    • computerDecision

      protected void computerDecision(ComputerPlayer player)
      Gets the computer decision, then selects the space.
      Parameters:
      player - a reference to the current computer player (could be player 1 or 2)

    • selectSpace

      protected void selectSpace(Player player, Map<BoardSpace, List<BoardSpace>> availableMoves, BoardSpace selectedDestination)
      Handles what happens when a player chooses to select a certain space during their turn.
      Parameters:
      player - current turn's player
      availableMoves - the available moves gotten from showMoves earlier
      selectedDestination - the selected destination space that was clicked on

    • updateGUIBoard

      protected void updateGUIBoard(Player player, Map<BoardSpace, List<BoardSpace>> availableMoves, BoardSpace selectedDestination)
      Updates the GUI Board by adding or updating discs from all origins to a given destination
      Parameters:
      player - player that is taking a turn
      availableMoves - the list of all available destinations and origins
      selectedDestination - the selected destination from either user input or computer decision

    • otherPlayer

      protected Player otherPlayer(Player player)
      Returns the other player given one of the player fields

    • gameOver

      protected void gameOver()
      Ends the game.
